_header: Sith Christ hath take both flesh and blood
Subjects: Virgin Mary, carols to; carols, to Virgin Mary
_description: James Ryman, A carol to the Virgin Mary — six quatrains (aaab) and burden (bb): ‘O benigna laude digna / tuo nato nos consigna’

CULEe112.First Lines:
Sith criste hath take both flesshe & blodeffor thy clennes and
                    thy myelde mode…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…That we come not into helle pitteTuo nato nos
                    consigna
